overview: Homecomin' is based on a true story of the coming together of a father and his son after a year-long separation. The strain caused by the separation is indicated by the resentment of the mother towards the father, and the son's initial distrust of his father's surprise return. This distrust, however, erodes as father, son, and one of his father's running buddies bicycle across the Brooklyn Bridge to Coney Island.
title: Homecomin'
